title: 0xc0000005 error
body: tapping the lol and seeing this error  pls help anybody

replies.body:
Hey, I'm guessing this error is happening either when trying to launch the patcher or the game.  It's likely caused by a security setting that either blocked a proper installation for a game file from being accessed.  Run through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access.

Once completed, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a force repatch to make sure your game files are installed without issue.  I hope that helps!
